issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The jobtracker hangs and jobtracker info server throws Internal Server Error when until task initialization a exception will be thrown. 
Future jobs will no processed and also the job info server does not show any information since it throws a a http 500.

This is a show blocker especially when hadoop is shell script driven.

comments.body: This patch solves the problem for me.
I have applied this patch.  Thanks, Stefan.
